sentence.text: 80.5 % of luminal-type tumours developed bone metastasis as opposed to 41.7 % of basal and 55.6 % of signal transduction-like tumours.

A novel 15-gene signature identified 82.4 % of the tumours with bone metastasis, 85.2 % of the tumours which had bone metastasis as first site of metastasis and 100 % of the ones with bone metastasis only (p 9.99e-09), in the training negative regulation of transcription, DNA-templated.

The expression levels of the up-regulated genes (regulation of translational initiation, retina homeostasis and PH-4) were also found to be correlated to epithelial to mesenchymal transition status of the tumour.
